column3: This makes a lot of sense, the use of API here has always bothered me but I wasn't sure how to fix it. Seems a good stopgap until we need #9306.\nACK (+ verified that `gettxoutsetinfo` fields that depend on this iteration display the same with and without this patch) apart from nit.

This 'override' is causing tons of warnings here (for every file that includes coins.h).
```
/home/orion/projects/bitcoin/bitcoin/src/coins.h:210:10: warning: 'GetCoin' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    bool GetCoin(const COutPoint &outpoint, Coin &coin) const;
```
Some compilers (clang5, in this case) demand that a whole class
Coins View DB vs coins db view?
> Coins View DB vs coins db view?\n\nAre you suggesting to rename the variable? If so I would slightly prefer not to, because this is a preexisting variable which this PR is just making public.

Thanks! Though I'm still getting one warning after this:
```
In file included from /home/.../bitcoin/src/rpc/rawtransaction.cpp:8:
